org.dejava.component.i18n.message.handler

Interface MessageCommand

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Serializable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    SimpleMessageCommand

    public interface MessageCommand
extends Serializable
    An implementation of the command design pattern in order to enable messages to be processed later.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addMessage(ApplicationMessageHandler appMessageHandler)
      Adds a message to the application context by evaluating the given information.

      Gets the locale for the message.

      • getMessage

        String getMessage(MessageHandler messageHandler)
           throws MessageNotFoundException
        Gets a message by evaluating the given information.
        Parameters:
        messageHandler - The message handler to be used.
        Returns:
        The evaluated localized message.
        Throws:
        MessageNotFoundException - If the message cannot be found.

      • addMessage

        void addMessage(ApplicationMessageHandler appMessageHandler)
         throws MessageNotFoundException
        Adds a message to the application context by evaluating the given information.
        Parameters:
        appMessageHandler - The application message handler to be used.
        Throws:
        MessageNotFoundException - If the message cannot be found.
